title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 4
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 4
description:
Time to select a Big Balls Bet of the Week, as Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter hunker down and lay out their best bets for NFL Week 4. Together they construct their draft of The Faves Five, their top 5 against the spread picks, plus their top plays and underdogs across the board. Will they continue their winning ways? Only time will tell! #Volume #ColinCowherd #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
